data.message: So I have this to say this past summer Facebook you helped my family reconnect with with my younger sister who we lost track of 29 years ago. We have at least been able to reconnect. We know where we all are now at least. But we are still having to wait till it financially feasible to reconnect face to face. I can't wait til that day comes!! I am so looking forward to it. By the way I located her in less than 24 hours! I was amazed by that!!! 😀

replies.message: Thanks for sharing that with us, Robin. We wish you and your family all the best in 2016.  -Jordan
